title: Presidio of San Francisco: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits Permits are required for group camping, commercial filming and outdoor events such as weddings, fairs and races - contact the Presidio Trust at (415) 561-5300 for events in the interior of the Presidio or the Special Park Uses Group at (415) 561-4300 for events at Crissy Field and along the waterfront.   Reservations Reservations are required for all education programs and for most interpretive ranger programs; please call (415) 561-4323 for more information and reservations. Click here for a calendar of ranger programs.
